name: Cast n' Catch
description:
The first video game that rewards you with free fishing gear just for playing! Play the game and fish to earn free guaranteed gear! Download and try it for free!

●Fish in different lake spots and catch as many fish as you can.
●Compete against the game, your friends or challenge professional anglers.
●Earn coins for winning challenges and use them to challenge friends or upgrade your equipment.
●Customize your clothes, equipment and boat.
●Upgrade your character and increase your catch rate. Each upgrade will help you learn more about lures, rods and other gear that contribute to being the best pro fisherman.
●Earn real fishing gear just for playing the game. Cast N Catch gives you GOOD gear for playing.

Download it and play to earn a spot in our real-life ultimate fishing tournament at the end of the year. The top 100 users will be eligible to fish in our tournament with a professional fisherman.

Simple: you'll get guaranteed fishing gear for playing our game and a chance to compete with top pros in real life.

Different tiers of gear are available. Free users get gear once a month. For a one-time fee, upgraded users get premium gear shipped out every other month.
